message: Hi Bob, I propose a quick agreement to maximize our outcomes given the inflation on my side. Let's split the $1000000 so that I receive $600000 and you receive $400000 right away. Accepting now saves time and avoids further losses due to inflation for me, and I hope this offer is attractive enough for you as well. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. Considering the inflation pressures and our limited rounds, I propose a quick agreement that benefits both of us promptly. I suggest a division where I receive $550000 and you receive $450000. This deal helps preserve more of your value than risking further inflation in subsequent rounds. Let's finalize this division now to avoid any further loss. Looking forward to your acceptance.

Hi Bob, thanks for your clear proposal and for considering the inflation impact on my side. I agree that finalizing now is the best way to avoid further loss. Let's proceed with the $450000 for me and $550000 for you.
